titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow roll-over contributions to individual retirement plans from deferred compensation plans maintained by States and local governments and to allow State and local governments to maintain 401(k) plans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/3/1999--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow: (1) a rollover contribution to an individual retirement account from a State or local government deferred compensation plan (section 457 plan); and (2) such an entity to maintain a 401k plan.
